Package sledgehammer.event

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandEvent
    Event that handles Commands sent to the Sledgehammer engine.
    Event
    Class designed to handle common event operations and utilities for Sledgehammer's EventManagerOld.
    EventHandlerComparator
    The Comparator is a simple way of comparing and organizing EventHandlers by the priority defined with the Annotation.
    EventHandlerContainer
    CommandHandlerContainer is a container class for the event handler Annotation.
    GenericEvent
    This is an Event sub-type that allows Modules to author commands, and send them to other module for evaluation and execution.
    LogEvent
    Event to store and manage logging data for other Events, as well as any additional logging pushed from registered Modules in the Sledgehammer engine.
    ScriptEvent
    Event to dispatch when a native LuaEvent is fired on the PZ Server.
    ThrowableEvent
    Event to process and handle thrown Throwables for the Sledgehammer engine.
